entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
